arts.ttl: Liam Manning makes honest Bristol City confession as Reds climb into top-six with Norwich win
arts.sum: Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community. "Of course I’m aware, I’m not going to sit here and say I don’t look at it," the City boss told Bristol Live after the full-time whistle.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings as Robins beat Norwich City 2-0 at Ashton Gate
arts.sum: Vyner was perhaps fortunate in the first half that Norwich were unable to punish him when his pass to Dickie left his defensive partner rather short. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: 'Predictable' - Norwich fans react to Robins loss
arts.sum: Norwich City fans react to the Canaries' 2-1 Championship loss to Bristol City at Ashton Gate.

arts.ttl: Bristol City beat Norwich to move into play-off places
arts.sum: Goals from Mark Sykes and Nahki Wells took Bristol City into the Championship play-off places with a 2-1 victory over Norwich at Ashton Gate.

arts.ttl: Bristol City edge out Norwich to move into Championship play-off places
arts.sum: Mark Sykes and Nahki Wells were on target in the first half.

arts.ttl: STARTING XIs: Sorensen one of three Norwich changes for Robins clash
arts.sum: Full team news and starting line-ups ahead of Norwich City’s Championship meeting with Bristol City at Ashton Gate.

arts.ttl: MATCHDAY LIVE: Bristol City v Norwich City
arts.sum: Follow live updates via our matchday blog above and join the debate with our chief Norwich City reporter Connor Southwell live from Ashton Gate

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Norwich as Manning due to face Williams dilemma
arts.sum: Liam Manning's side extended their unbeaten run in the Championship to five matches as a 90th-minute Mark Sykes equaliser helped City secure a 1-1 draw with the Blades on Tuesday evening . While there is plenty of debate to be had about who starts and where in both midfield and attack, at this moment in time, it feels like the Bristol City backline sort of picks itself.

arts.ttl: Bristol City football hooligan in Cardiff got caught because of his ginger hair
arts.sum: Bristol City fan Mackenzie Bailey thought he had got away with lobbing a can at an O'Neill's pub in Cardiff city centre

arts.ttl: Carrow Road drum row reaches deafening levels as Norwich City fans fall out
arts.sum: City Elite, the Norwich City fan group which organises drumming during Carrow Road games, has fallen out with club officials and other supporters.
